switchy.compat.module.apoli.description: A module that switches power data from Apace's Apoli.
switchy.compat.module.apoli.enabled: Power data will be saved alongside each presets' origins.
switchy.compat.module.apoli.disabled: Powers will be created fresh when switching presets with different origins.
switchy.compat.module.apoli.warning: All power data (resources, extra inventory, etc.) for other presets' origins will be dropped/lost!
switchy.compat.module.hidearmor.descript: A module that switches hidden armor from unascribed's Fabrication's /hidearmor.
switchy.compat.module.hidearmor.disabled: /hidearmor will change armor visibility for all presets.
switchy.compat.module.hidearmor.warning: All other /hidearmor settings will be cleared!
switchy.compat.module.fabrictailor.descr: A module that switches player skins from samolego's Fabric Tailor.
switchy.compat.module.fabrictailor.enabl: You will be able to set a skin per-preset.
switchy.compat.module.fabrictailor.disab: You will share a single skin across all presets.
switchy.compat.module.fabrictailor.warni: All other overridden skins will be cleared!
switchy.compat.module.origins.descriptio: A module that switches layered Origins from Apace's Origins.
switchy.compat.module.origins.enabled: You will be able to have an origin (or layered set) for each preset. BYO Orbs of Origin.
switchy.compat.module.origins.disabled: You will share one set of origins across all presets.
switchy.compat.module.origins.warning: All other sets of origins will be lost!
switchy.compat.module.pehkui.description: A module that switches scale values (e.g. sizes) from Virtuoel's Pehkui.
switchy.compat.module.pehkui.enabled: Scale changes will apply only to the current preset.
switchy.compat.module.pehkui.disabled: Scale changes will apply regardless of the current preset.
switchy.compat.module.pehkui.warning: All other scale values wil be cleared!
switchy.compat.module.styled_nicknames.d: A module that switches nicknames from Patbox's Styled Nicknames.
switchy.compat.module.styled_nicknames.e: You will be able to set nicknames per-preset.
switchy.compat.module.styled_nicknames.d: You will share a single nickname across all presets.
switchy.compat.module.styled_nicknames.w: All other nicknames will be cleared!
